      • diagonalize

        public Matrix diagonalize(int nrot)
        Diagonalize this matrix with the Jacobi algorithm.
        Parameters:
        nrot - Count of max. rotations
        Returns:
        Matrix m, with m^t * this * m = diagonal
        Keywords:
        Jacobi algorithm, diagonalization
